title: PGPD Announces Arrest in Murder on Danville Road
body:
On April 1, 2012, at approximately 4:25 a.m.,
patrol officers responded to the 4100 block of Danville Road for the report of
a missing person.  Upon arrival, officers
began a search for the missing person and discovered a body at the home which
was identified as Dorothy McKay Ogden. She was pronounced dead on the scene.
Warner was Ogden’s granddaughter. They lived together at the home.County Police Department’s Homicide Unit at 301-772-4925. 
Callers wishing to remain anonymous may call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411 TIPS
(8477), text “PGPD plus your message” to CRIMES (274637) on your cell phone or
go to  and submit a
tip online.
